title: "oth_DS_HAPIEE_LT"
output: html_document

```{r, echo=TRUE}
library(epiDisplay)
library(dplyr)
library(data.table)
# Connecting with Opal data server
## Login to server and assign study data
#Load Opal R library
library(opal)
# Create an opal object with the login information
erasmus_opal <- opal.login()
#Login to Opal server and assign the content of the HAPIEE table(s) to your RStudio environment
#HAPIEE_W2 
opal.assign.table.tibble(erasmus_opal, 'HAPIEE_W2', 'HAPIEE.HAPIEE_W2',variables = list('country','w2h14','w2h10c','w2h10a','w2h10b','w2h15','w2h15b','w2h7','h15a_lt','h10b_lt','h10a_lt','h10c_lt','h15a_lt','d_bmi_lt','h5_lt','e52_lt','h6_lt','e51_lt','e61_lt'))

HAPIEE_W2<- opal.execute(erasmus_opal,'HAPIEE_W2')

#HAPIEE_W2_hl 
opal.assign.table.tibble(erasmus_opal, 'HAPIEE_W2_hl', 'HAPIEE.HAPIEE_W2_hl',variables = list('w2h8d','w2h8h'))

HAPIEE_W2_hl<- opal.execute(erasmus_opal,'HAPIEE_W2_hl')

```
## Select country-specific sample
```{r,echo=FALSE}
HAPIEE_W2 <- subset(HAPIEE_W2, HAPIEE_W2$country==4)
HAPIEE_W2_hl<-subset(HAPIEE_W2_hl,HAPIEE_W2_hl$id %in% HAPIEE_W2$id)
```
## Assign participant id as first column of your harmonized dataframes
```{r, echo=FALSE}
oth_HAPIEE_LT_0 <- data.frame(id = HAPIEE_W2$id )
```
## When you are done with your work, logout of Opal server
```{r, echo=FALSE}
opal.logout(erasmus_opal)
```

### **Variable label**: Currently under treatment for diabetes  
**Variable name**:  dis_diab_tx_0  
**Variable description**:  Indicator of whether the participant is currently under treatment for diabetes.    
**Value type**:  integer  
**Variable unit**:  N/A  
**Category coding**:  

**Code** | **Category Label**  
---------| -------------------------------------  
0        | Not currently under treatment for diabetes  
1        | Currently under treatment for diabetes  

**Harmonization status**:  complete  
**Harmonization comment**:  Study-specific variable "if YES (you been told by a doctor you have diabetes), how are you treated?" is categorized as: Only by diet | By diet and insulin | By diet and tablets | By diet, tablets and insulin | No treatment. Participants who reported being treated for diabetes by diet only were coded as not currently under treatment for diabetes.   
**R script**:
```{r, echo=TRUE}
oth_HAPIEE_LT_0$dis_diab_tx_0<-ifelse(oth_HAPIEE_LT_0$dis_diab_ever_0==0,0L,recode(as.integer(HAPIEE_W2$w2h15b),"1"=0L,"2"=1L,"3"=1L,"4"=1L,"5"=0L, .default=NA_integer_))
  

```
